law.catch_line: A majority of the full authorized membership of the Board is a quorum....

text.section: A majority of the full authorized membership of the Board is a quorum.
The Board shall meet at least once every 3 months, at the times and places that it determines.

Each member of the Board is entitled to:
Compensation in accordance with the budget of the Board; and
Reimbursement for expenses at a rate determined by the Board.
The Board may employ a staff in accordance with the State budget.
